info.title: debug_traceCall example
info.description: This API example demonstrates how to use the debug_traceCall method to execute a call and retrieve a  detailed execution trace of the call, similar to a transaction but without creating a transaction on the blockchain.

post.summary: Execute a call and retrieve a detailed execution trace

200.description: Detailed execution trace of the call

structLogs.description: An array of execution steps (opcodes) taken by the call.

gas.description: The gas provided by the call.

returnValue.description: The return value of the call, if any.

gasUsed.description: The total gas used by the call.
